name: @tagspaces/shell
description: Shell script for creating thumbnails and search index for the TagSpaces applications
author: TagSpaces Authors <contact@tagspaces.org>

scripts.node-install: rimraf package-lock.json && rimraf node_modules && npx cross-env PD_PLATFORM=node npm install && npm dedupe
scripts.pkg-publish: npm run node-install && npm run build:prod && npm publish --access public
